mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news_reply VALUES (#{id},#{news_no},#{pwd},#{content},SYSDATE,(SELECT NVL(MAX(no)+1,1) FROM news_reply))
mapper.select: SELECT id,content,regdate,news_no,no FROM news_reply WHERE news_no=#{news_no} ORDER BY NO
mapper.update: UPDATE news_reply SET content=#{content} WHERE no=#{no}
